response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to us and has the potential to significantly impact your business. After careful consideration, we have decided to extend this offer to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset that could greatly benefit your operations and contribute to your growth. We believe that this investment aligns well with your strategic objectives and can provide substantial returns. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 950000}
